item.title: Docker Basics
item.description: This is my reference article to introduce docker basic concepts. Agenda Overview Why and What? Why do you need docker? Modern architectures usually involve existing services to handle some responsibilities in the service we want to offer.We want to use those services because we don’t have time to reinvent the wheel and they are robust, cheap/free, standard, … name it (e.g nginx, haproxy, postgresql, redis, python, etc…).
